item.description:
Come to our potluck dinner and hear speaker, Jennie Thompson on pastlives. Also an opportunity for a past life regression! Meet other like-minded people. Just bring any dish!



We are located on 374 Main Street in Cherry Valley, (Route 9 in Leicester). Just 2.6 miles past the intersection of Park, Main and Stafford on the right hand side across from Jan's Package store.

For more information, see http://www.aplaceofli...
item.name: Worcester Indigo Children and Parents January Meetup
